constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 139 (Friday, August 26, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. VEASEY:
H.R. 8751.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
article I section 8 clause 3 of the Constitution
[Page H7727]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: High School Sports Injury Reporting
